idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
kick = 0     # Kick drum ID (check Drum Scope)
snare = 2    # Snare ID
hihat = 4    # Hi-hat ID

for bar in range(8):
    playSound(kick, beats=1, velocity=115)
    playSound(hihat, beats=0.5, velocity=60); rest(0.5)
    playSound(snare, beats=1, velocity=100)
    playSound(hihat, beats=0.5, velocity=60); rest(0.5)
    playSound(kick, beats=1, velocity=105)
    playSound(hihat, beats=0.5, velocity=60); rest(0.5)
    playSound(snare, beats=1, velocity=100)
    playSound(hihat, beats=0.5, velocity=60); rest(0.5)

idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
for i in range(4):  # repeat pattern 4 times â‰ˆ 1 min
    for chord, beats in piano_chords:
        playNotes(chord, beats=1, velocity=80, sustain=2)
        rest(1)
        playNotes(chord, beats=1, velocity=70, sustain=2)
        rest(2)

idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
# New TunePad cell
bass_line = [36, 33, 29, 31]   # C, A, F, G notes (low octave)

for i in range(4):
    for note in bass_line:
        playNote(note, beats=1, velocity=90, sustain=0.8)
        rest(0.5)
        playNote(note, beats=0.5, velocity=70, sustain=0.3)
